power.name: Eidetic Memory
power.text: You may play a card. Return one of your cards in play to your hand

ul.li: Select a target. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to that target by 1
One player may search their deck for a card and put it into their hand
Deal 2 melee damage to a target

text.p: When this card enters play Alexandria regains 2 HP
At the end of your turn, select a target. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that target would take damage, redirect that damage to Alexandria
When this card enters play shuffle your trash into your deck
Whenever you would draw a card, instead reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, put 1 in your hand, and return the other to the top of your deck
When this card enters play reveal the top 3 cards of the villain deck. Put them back in any order
At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of the villain deck. Either discard it or return it to the top of the villain deck
From when this card enters play until the start of your next turn, when Alexandria would take damage you may discard a card. If you do, prevent the damage.
Reduce damage dealt to Alexandria by 1
After this card is played you may deal 2 damage to a target
When Alexandria deals damage to a villain target you may destroy an Equipment or Ongoing card
After this card is played you may destroy a non-character card target
When Alexandria destroys a target select a target. Until the start of your next turn that target cannot deal damage
When this card is put into play draw a card
Whenever you use a power, Alexandria regains 3 HP
Treat Alexandria as if she was the the target with the highest HP
Whenever Alexandria would be dealt exactly 1 damage, prevent it
At the end of your turn, reveal the top 3 cards of a deck. Put them back in any order.
Note down Alexandria's current HP
At the start of your next turn, if Alexandria was not incapacitated, set Alexandria's HP to the value you noted down

card.name: I Know Them
card.text: Deal 5 damage to the villain target with the highest HP

text.p: The villain target with the highest HP deals Alexandria 5 psychic damage.
The villain target with the highest HP cannot deal damage until the start of your next turn
